price: 55. Soki ye te (kotika Allah), bosalela ngai likita bino banso (na banzambe na bino), mpe bozelisa ngai te.
arabic: مِن دُونِهِۦۖ فَكِيدُونِي جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ لَا تُنظِرُونِ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: min dūnihi fakīdūnī jamīʿan thumma lā tunẓirūni
